original_text: The rain causes the dust of the dry ground to become hard. The dry soil becomes pieces of mud. The rain causes the dust of the dry ground to become hard. The dry soil becomes pieces of mud. The rain causes the dust of the dry ground to become hard. The dry soil becomes pieces of mud. The rain causes the dust of the dry ground to become hard.
korean_text: 티끌이 덩어리를 이루며 흙덩이가 서로 붙게 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: The rain causes the dust of the dry ground to become hard.
sentences.korean_translation: 비는 마른 땅의 먼지가 단단하게 만듭니다.
